result.execSummary:
Hercules John was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Hercules John was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Luis Gutierrez has been appointed to represent the defendant.
Review hearing on August 5, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Warrant for Commitment. Signed by Commissioner Herring on 07/07/2022.

ADDRESS INFO for Hercules John
Current: 515 W Moreland Blvd, C/O Waukesha County Jail, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 07-07-2022)
Prior: 21056 W Main St, Lannon, WI 53046
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.

01:08 PM Defendant Hercules John in court, in custody, with State Public Defender Law Intern Patrick Sicula.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Abigail Kincheloe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed.  Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint, affidavit, and warrant for commitment and waives reading.  Court conducts waiver of extradition colloquy with the defendant.  Defendant wants to waive extradition.  Court accepts the waiver of extradition.  Court signs the waiver of extradition and warrant for commitment.  State of Louisiana is to be notified ASAP to pick up the defendant.  The State is asking for high cash bail.  Defense is asking for a smaller amount of cash bail.  Review hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Affidavit and Arrest Warrant for Louisiana
